Description:
AI adoption in nonprofits often stalls not due to lack of vision, but because of fragmented data environments systems, siloed teams, and uneven digital readiness. This session explores how strategic skilling initiatives can unify data, people, and processes to accelerate AI transformation. Learn how nonprofits are using AI-focused training to bridge gaps between IT and program teams, streamline data migration, and foster a culture of collaboration.
